channel.title: Why does the server often crash, once the query is big ？
channel.description: Our server is 2c8g, but once we query a little large query from mongoDB, the server crash. May I ask where the problem may be?

item.title: Why does the server often crash, once the query is big ？
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
Welcome to the forum!

How many rows of data are returned from your query? It sounds like your server is running out of memory.

Read full topic
item.source: Why does the server often crash, once the query is big ？
